solution_line_template: They are making {total_smores} S'mores because {num_friends} x {smores_per_person} = <<{num_friends}*{smores_per_person}={total_smores}>>{total_smores}
Each S'more costs $.75 to make because {cost_per_batch} / {smores_per_batch} = <<{cost_per_batch}/{smores_per_batch}={cost_per_smore}>>{cost_per_smore}
It will cost $18 to make them all because {total_smores} x {cost_per_smore} = <<{total_smores}*{cost_per_smore}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
